title: Bug (idk what to call it) with bewitching Nidalee
body:
I recently bought the bewitching {{champion:76}} skin and noticed that her human form E skill (heal) has the base {{champion:76}} skins animation for it, which instead of having the bats fly around, it has leaves. I'm unsure if it's intentional or not but it sorta feels weird that all her other animations have bats, and her heal doesn't follow that theme.

sorry if this is in the wrong section but i couldn't find a more relevant one.
